ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Before them We put Pharaoh's people to the test when a noble Messenger came to them, saying
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We had tried the people of Pharaoh before them. A respected prophet had come to them (saying):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed before that We subjected the Pharaonites to the same test. A noble Messenger came to them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We had certainly tested the people of the Pharaoh before them to whom a noble Messengers had come, saying,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And before them We indeed tried the people of Firaun, and an Honourable Noble Messenger came to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We tried before them Fir`awn's people, when there came to them a noble Messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We tried before them the people of Firon, and there came to them a noble apostle,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Already before them We tried the people of Pharaoh, and a noble Messenger came unto them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily We tried before them Pharaoh's folk, when there came unto them a noble messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We tried the people of Pharaoh before them: a noble messenger was sent to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly afore them We proved Fir'awn's people, and there came Unto them an apostle honoured.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We tried the people of Pharaoh before them, when a noble apostle came to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We did, before them, try the people of Pharaoh: there came to them a messenger most honourable,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We tried before them Fir'aun's (Pharaoh) people, when there came to them a noble Messenger [i.e. Musa (Moses)],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We tried Pharaoh's nation before them. A noble Messenger came to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Before them We tested the people of Pharaoh; a noble messenger came to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:17] And certainly We tried, We tested, before them the people of Pharaoh, together with him, when a messenger came to them, namely, Moses, peace be upon him, who was honoured, before God, exalted be He,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily We tried before them) before the Quraysh (Pharaoh's folk) by punishing them, (when there came unto them a noble messenger) i.e. Moses,
